General.Name: Asia Tele-Net and Technology Corporation Limited
General.Description: Asia Tele-Net and Technology Corporation Limited, an investment holding company, engages in the design, manufacturing, and sale of electroplating machinery and other industrial machinery. It also provides installation and after sale services for electroplating machines; sells spare parts; and offers management services. In addition, it is involved in securities trading, property holding and investment, software development, and money lending businesses. It operates in the People's Republic of China, Mexico, the United States, Korea, Taiwan, Russia, Singapore, India, Canada, the United Kingdom, Slovakia, France, Macedonia, Germany, and internationally. The company was formerly known as Process Automation (Holdings) Ltd and changed its name to Asia Tele-Net and Technology Corporation Limited in 1999. Asia Tele-Net and Technology Corporation Limited was founded in 1966 and is headquartered in Wan Chai, Hong Kong.
General.Address: Tai Yau Building, Wan Chai, Hong Kong
